conbody.p: Just like Windows and Mac, Linux is an operating system. It is created by Linux Torvalds who was designed the core of the operating system back when he was a student for one of his classes. It is based on UNIX, but it has a greater success, because of the great community, open-source and hey, it is free!

Open source means that you have unlimited access to the code and you can design everything as you want. And for that reason there are hundreds of different interpretations for Linux, that are called Distributions or distros.
